nodes.dialog_text: Last Britain, Bastion under the Bridge & Empire of Treasured Trash

Blender cube upside down dimension, empty and devoid of most
life
how you find it is by
- weird see through cube through walls that you follow
or
- confronted by weird cube
or
- bugging your way off the map?

blender cube is

has

choices: Grungulus the Succubus Mayor of Halloween Town
wake up at home, new day and you have to go figure out what's happening

nodes.dialog_text:
"Hello, did you get my note? I left it on your desk but you were
kinda asleep at the time. You should have read it surely."

wake up in a cage hanging from a tall tree in halloween town
crowd gathered around you just kinda awkwardly staring
you are dizzy and your vision is spotty
you are greeted by mayor grungulus before he turns away to start
the festivities
a celebration happens around the prison tree, goes on for hours until
player falls asleep in a daze and wakes up back in highschool or
something

speedrun ending, if you punch enough you reach the hell dream and
win [gore warning]
if you stop before that, you can beat anime boy to death or ko
you are a liar, dunno what that means yet

gets really offended, hurt his feelings and he runs away
might abduct you later

Oh, that's such a relief, I was so nervous when I wrote that

asks you to meet somewhere where he'll take you to halloween town
[with drugs] abduction
Soppy anime bullshit nonsense, you're free to move on.

Approached by a fairly average looking boy with intense eyes, you
vaguely remember him as one of the more popular kids that some
fawned over but you have no memory whatever for. He must
have been the one that left you that little note in class.

You know to mind your own business and go on with your life, time
to go home or something.

Their aim was not true, and you dodge into a glass soda bottle thrown
at you by your teacher.

You wake up with your face flat against a school desk.
There is a puddle of drool pooling around you on the table
 coming from your mouth.
You hear a shout and the sound of something flying at you.

choices: Of course, it was really sweet actually
[Lie] Yes of course. I should have a response back to you in 2 days.
I mean I did but you're a bit of a creep

nodes.dialog_text:
You do your best to collect yourself and shrug off the remarks.
As you go to get up you notice a little folded note left on your desk,
probably left there while you were taking your nap.

Open it?

With nerves of steel you don't even flinch, and a glass soda bottle
smashes to pieces on the floor next to you. Looking up you see your
teacher.

Teacher
"Pay Attention!"
"It's numbnutz like you that make me regret ever becoming a
teacher... whatever. Class dismissed!"
